Pre-Game Insights: The Brewers have dominated the season series, winning 7 out of 10 matchups so far.
The Cardinals' bullpen has been a concern this season, with a combined ERA that ranks them near the bottom of the league.
The Brewers' bullpen has been a strength, ranking among the top in the league with a solid ERA and a penchant for closing out games effectively.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game features Andre Pallante (6-6, 3.80 ERA) for St. Louis against Freddy Peralta (9-7, 3.70 ERA) for Milwaukee.
The Cardinals' offense ranks fifth in the National League with 668 runs scored this season.
The Brewers have excelled in pitching, particularly at home.
Others: Sal Frelick has been a consistent performer for the Brewers this season, with a batting average of.283 and 21 home runs and 72 RBIs.
The Cardinals have struggled on the road, sitting with a 33-36 record.
